storyName: My Life I Gave for You
storyInfo: An abrupt conflagration cuts short Federico's pursuit.

attributes.content: I'm a little surprised.
attributes.name: Aulus

attributes.content: Because I've come to turn my back on the faith?
attributes.name: Abbot

attributes.content: Because of what you're evading, Stefano.
attributes.name: Aulus

attributes.content: I don't know whether you're under some outside influence, but if...
attributes.name: Aulus

attributes.content: There are no ifs, Aulus.
attributes.name: Abbot

attributes.content: I am not so far gone that Arts would sway me.
attributes.name: Abbot

attributes.content: There are times when Arts doesn't need to change our minds at all. All too many things can impact us, Stefano.
attributes.name: Aulus

attributes.content: You are asking that I reconsider. Why, heretic priest?
attributes.name: Abbot

attributes.content: Is this decision of mine not what you always wanted to see?
attributes.name: Abbot

attributes.content: I can't deny it.
attributes.name: Aulus

attributes.content: But in turn, I have to recognize that back when this extraordinary building was still in Iberia, it was my fortune to study here, and those days were precious like little else to me then.
attributes.name: Aulus

attributes.content: In this way, Stefano, I'm just like you. I feel for this place, just as you do.
attributes.name: Aulus

attributes.content: I still remember the cleric who came with you from Laterano.
attributes.name: Aulus

attributes.content: I remember very many.
attributes.name: Aulus

attributes.content: The one you recall took his gun, sixty years ago, and made the decision to fall in line with the Church of then. While I...
attributes.name: Abbot

attributes.content: I chose to stay behind, and protect those who were left.
attributes.name: Abbot

attributes.content: And this fed your faith, enduring until now.
attributes.name: Aulus

attributes.content: If you know so well, why would you still have me continue to wait, to endure?
attributes.name: Abbot

attributes.content: Are you about to refute all that you've maintained and proclaimed, just to turn around and tell me to deliberate, exhort me to stay fast?
attributes.name: Abbot

attributes.content: Of course not. Stefano, you know I wouldn't.
attributes.name: Aulus

attributes.content: But at core, I walk the path I believe is right, and so I would hope I could say the same of you.
attributes.name: Aulus

attributes.content: Tomorrow morning, should you still be committed, I will consider it your choice then.
attributes.name: Aulus

attributes.content: I will prepare what you need.
attributes.name: Aulus

attributes.content: If you are not yet decided, I will advise you to continue contemplation.
attributes.name: Aulus

attributes.content: Whatever it may be... I hope your decision will be that you find truest.
attributes.name: Aulus

attributes.content: Aulus, you wrongly assume one thing.
attributes.name: Abbot

attributes.content: And what is right?
attributes.name: Aulus

attributes.content: I am lost for any other choice.
attributes.name: Abbot

attributes.content: Very well. Should this be Truth's ordain...
attributes.name: Aulus

attributes.content: Then I will welcome you, Stefano, my brother anew.
attributes.name: Aulus

attributes.content: Mind if I come in?
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: ...You can.
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: 'Scuse me.
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: You're not doing too hot, then?
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: ...Can I ask a question?
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: Sure.
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: Is... Is Fina not...?
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: With us anymore?
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: Not to push you, but I'd prefer some other question.
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: I'm not really up for lying to you.
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: Okay.
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: Actually, I had an inkling all along...
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: When it happened, I just suddenly—couldn't feel Fina anymore... even though she was so angry, and so upset...
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: And she was right there in front of me, right...? But I couldn't find her anywhere...
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: If I hadn't helped you fix up that gun...
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: No!
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: Don't say it, please...
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: ...Alright.
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: I felt the horns—on my head. They're horns just like Raimund's.
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: I can't ever pray holding my gun again, but at least...
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: I finally—fit in, with Raimund, and Caroline...
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: I fit in with everybody.
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: Hah, the flowers weren't blooming this early last year. Funny timing now, hm?
No complaints, though. One last bloom for the road.
attributes.name: Raimund

attributes.content: And so...
attributes.name: Raimund

attributes.content: That'll do it...
attributes.name: Raimund

attributes.content: Repeat that... we have a fallen angel? That Fortuna girl?
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Yes.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: I wasn't expecting that one, let me tell you...
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Fallen... Our only option is to hold on until we get back, then let His Holiness decide. It's not something we can handle right here.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: But that surprise visitor who barged into my room is a different story. Federico, there's some things I'll explain to you later... for now, anything's a non-starter unless we find that visitor, whatever it is.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: I require your assistance, Executor Federico.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: It has mobility on its side. I managed to chase it down this far, but that was a stretch, and I've lost it now anyway.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Huh, no immediate reply?
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: That's rare. You're making me feel like something bad happened to you... Hey, I see those knit brows. Something bad did happen, then?
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: ...I heard strings.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Strings? Did... you? I don't think I heard anything...?
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Based on my inference, the sound came from the sacrarium on the top floor.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Right...
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Let me be real. I've gotten to know the length and breadth of your work at the Notarial Hall, which is why I'm relatively willing to trust your judgment.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: I am now formally querying you—
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Notarial Hall Executor Federico, do you truly believe this unidentified, unascertained, and possibly completely benign sound of strings—
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Stands to be more important than the request for assistance I'm making of you?
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: It does not.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Obviously not.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: The occurrence of the sound is a chance event. I have suspicions about it, but I cannot deny that I as of yet find no direct correlation between it and our catalog of current affairs.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Based on present circumstances, I judge that priority should be given to providing requisite assistance, in tandem operation with you.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Heheh. All done then?
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Alright, alright, I'm not here to bully you anyway. Just, I do need to check in with how you're doing real quick.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: I see now.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Point me in a direction. I'll continue target pursuit, and I'll leave you to sort out the strings debacle.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: This mission requires that we prioritize assuring yours and Oren's safety.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Due diligence is great and all, but I say priority's the kind of thing you need to judge yourself.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: I can't sense your emotions, Federico. Still, I have this Liberi friend, see, who's the reason I learned long ago how to guess what people are thinking. Couldn't do empathy with her, after all.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: She might be a lot easier to figure out than you are, but some things carry over.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: One teensy little word of advice—maybe sometimes, you need to learn to trust your instinct.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: That settles that. We don't have time to waste... and I've gotta force myself to be a little active anyway.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Operation a-go! Move out, everyone~
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Speed up.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Senior Federico! W—Wait one moment, please!
attributes.name: Clément

attributes.content: What exactly do... you think is up there? It was just the sound of strings, and we can't even hear it anymore!
attributes.name: Clément

attributes.content: Are—Are we really going to let the seniora brave the danger on her own? She's in a wheelchair, after all...
attributes.name: Clément

attributes.content: You have no need to worry.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: How could I not worry? I just saw it myself... it was a monster!
attributes.name: Clément

attributes.content: Lemuen was admitted into the Lateran by personal invitation of a Cardinal of the Seventh Tribunal. Her strength defies any contempt.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Do not underestimate her.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: I don't quite follow what you're telling me—I assume you mean she's just as mighty herself?
attributes.name: Clément

attributes.content: But... what if?
attributes.name: Clément

attributes.content: Speed up. Or stay where you are and wait.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: I suggest you pick the latter. It is the safer option.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: (Empty?)
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: (No.)
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Subtle noises spill through the spacious sacrarium. The loading of the gun keeps audible lockstep rhythm.
The executor suddenly points.
Come out.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: I will only warn you once more. Come out from there.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Ah... he found us.
attributes.name: Lively Child

attributes.content: He found us. He's just like the lady said...
attributes.name: Shy Child

attributes.content: Yeah, the big man found us right away!
attributes.name: Lively Child

attributes.content: Is—Is he really the man she was talking about?
attributes.name: Shy Child

attributes.content: He's got the wings and ring and they're all black. It's him, must be.
attributes.name: Lively Child

attributes.content: Mister, my name is Erendel!
attributes.name: Lively Child

attributes.content: I'm Estara...
attributes.name: Shy Child

attributes.content: Where is the woman who described me to you?
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: He looks really, really scary...
attributes.name: Estara

attributes.content: You're too scary! And you didn't even say your name... that's just rude!
attributes.name: Erendel

attributes.content: Mamma says if you don't know someone's name and they're a stranger, you shouldn't tell them anything...
attributes.name: Estara

attributes.content: Federico.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Senior Federico's scary. Is he a good guy...?
attributes.name: Estara

attributes.content: I bet he is! Just like in the story.
attributes.name: Erendel

attributes.content: W—We can tell him, then, right?
attributes.name: Estara

attributes.content: Probably we can?
attributes.name: Erendel

attributes.content: Um... well...
attributes.name: Estara

attributes.content: Someone told us...
attributes.name: Estara

attributes.content: We had to wait here for a really scary big man with a black ring on his head just like she has!
attributes.name: Erendel

attributes.content: And she—she said you'd find Mamma with us...
attributes.name: Estara

attributes.content: Yeah! And also she said we were only allowed to wait a little, tiny bit! And if you didn't come, then we come out ourselves.
attributes.name: Erendel

attributes.content: Um... she said we couldn't stay here forever.
attributes.name: Estara

attributes.content: And also, also, she said...
attributes.name: Estara

attributes.content: Eek!
attributes.name: Estara & Erendel

attributes.content: Senior, Senior! Quick... there's a fire!
attributes.name: Estara & Erendel

attributes.content: Wah!
attributes.name: Estara

attributes.content: Waargh!
attributes.name: Erendel

attributes.content: Get out for now.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Cover your mouth and nose. A fire has broken out.
attributes.name: Federico
